body:
3.6.0 is no longer available for download on PyPI. Apparently the `setup.py` was missing `python_requires`, causing it to be pulled in by Python 2 users: https://github.com/PyTables/PyTables/issues/772

Successfully installs on Cray CNL5 with GCC 5.3.0 and Python 3.7.4.
title: Add py-tables 3.6.1
